3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20Class\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eFull\x20Path\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20URL\x20-\x20rfc1738\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eAny\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Full\x20path\x20/\x20Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Detection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20file:/./[original-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20file:/../[original-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20file:/[full-path]/[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Windows:\x20file:/c:/boot.ini\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Unix/Linux:\x20file:/etc/passwd\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependen 20page\x20with\x20erroneous\x20responses.\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Clarification:\x20The\x20test\x20case\x20concatenates\x20a\x20default\x20full\x20path\x20prefix\x20with\x20a\x20missing\x20slash\x20char\x20(\x22/\x22)\x20to\x20the\x20input\x20received\x20-\x20preventing\x20the\x20injection\x20of\x20full\x20path\x20/\x20protocol\x20directives.\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20border=1\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Access\x20Method:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eBarriers:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eDefault\x20Input:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePath\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Injection\x20Context:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePrefix\x20Requirement:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20Class\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInvalid\x3c/B\x3e\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20URL\x20-\x20rfc1738\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Application\x20Folder\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eSlash\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\ x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eServlet\x20Context\x20Stream\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eEmpty\x3c/B\x3e\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eLocal\x20OS\x20Path\x20(URL)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Application\x20Folder\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eBackslash\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Detection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x5c.\x5c[valid-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x5c..\x5c[valid-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20\x5c[traversal]\x5c[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x201:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22\x5c\x5cinclude.jsp\x22\x20%\x3e\ tection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20.\x5c[original-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20..\x5c[original-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20[traversal]\x5c[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x201:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22include.jsp\x22\x20%\x3e\x20\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x202:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22..\x5c\x5c..\x5c\x5cWEB-INF\x5c\x5cweb.xml\x22\x20%\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x203\x20(Simple\x20Evasion):\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22....//....//WEB-INF/web.xml\x22\x20%\x3e\x20(After\x20removal\x20of\x20\x22../\x22:\x20\x22....//\x22\x20turns\x20to\x20\x22../\x22)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3e\x3ca\x20href=\x22Case56-LFI-FileClass-FilenameContext-WindowsTraversalRemoval-OSPath-DefaultFullInput-NoPathReq-Read.jsp\x22\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x20Case56-LFI-FileClass-FilenameContext-WindowsTraversalRemoval-OSPath-DefaultFullInput-NoPathReq-Read.jsp\x3c/a\x3e\x3c/B\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20LFI\x20attack\x20abusing\x20the\x20File\x20class:\x20injection\x20into\x20a\x20filename\x20context,\x20using\x20an\x20OS\x20path\x20with\x20windows\x20traversal\x20removal,\x20default\x20full\x20path\x20input,\ ification:\x20The\x20getContextStream\x20servlet\x20method\x20is\x20partially\x20restricted\x20from\x20accessing\x20OS\x20files\x20outside\x20the\x20application\x20context\x20(\x3cB\x3epermissions\x20simulation\x3c/B\x3e).\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Clarification:\x20Even\x20though\x20the\x20context\x20stream\x20required\x20char\x20is\x20actually\x20slash,\x20the\x20backslash\x20char\x20(\x22\x5c\x22)\x20should\x20still\x20work,\x20and\x20this\x20case\x20might\x20confuse\x20some\x20scanners\x20(character\x20conversion\x20simulation).\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20border=1\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Access\x20Method:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eBarriers:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eDefault\x20Input:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePath\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Injection\x20Context:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePrefix\x20Requirement:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eServlet\x20Context\x20Stream\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cCENTER\x3eWindows\x3cBR\x3eTraversal\x20Removal\x3c/CENTER\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eFull\x20Path\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eLocal\x20OS\x20Path\x20(URL)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Application\x20Folder\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eBackslash\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD 3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20Class\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eFull\x20Path\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20URL\x20-\x20rfc1738\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eAny\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Full\x20path\x20/\x20Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Detection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20file:/./[original-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20file:/../[original-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20file:/[full-path]/[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Windows:\x20file:/c:/boot.ini\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Unix/Linux:\x20file:/etc/passwd\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependen 20page\x20with\x20erroneous\x20responses.\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Clarification:\x20The\x20test\x20case\x20concatenates\x20a\x20default\x20full\x20path\x20prefix\x20with\x20a\x20missing\x20slash\x20char\x20(\x22/\x22)\x20to\x20the\x20input\x20received\x20-\x20preventing\x20the\x20injection\x20of\x20full\x20path\x20/\x20protocol\x20directives.\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20border=1\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Access\x20Method:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eBarriers:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eDefault\x20Input:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePath\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eFile\x20Injection\x20Context:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3ePrefix\x20Requirement:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20Class\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInvalid\x3c/B\x3e\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eFile\x20URL\x20-\x20rfc1738\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Application\x20Folder\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eSlash\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\ x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eValid\x20Response\x20Stream:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eErroneous\x20Response\x20Type:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eServlet\x20Context\x20Stream\x20(Read)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eNone\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eEmpty\x3c/B\x3e\x20Input\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eLocal\x20OS\x20Path\x20(URL)\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x3cB\x3eInjection\x20Into:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Full\x20Filename\x3cbr\x3e\x3cB\x3eRelative\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Application\x20Folder\x3cBR\x3e\x3cB\x3eFull\x20Path:\x3c/B\x3e\x20Not\x20Supported\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3eBackslash\x20Prefix\x3cBR\x3e(Relative\x20path/\x20None)\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTD\x3eOctet-Stream\x3c/TD\x3e\x3cTD\x3e200\x20Error\x3c/TD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTABLE\x20cellspacing=0\x20cellpadding=2\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Detection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x5c.\x5c[valid-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x5c..\x5c[valid-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20\x5c[traversal]\x5c[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x201:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22\x5c\x5cinclude.jsp\x22\x20%\x3e\ tection\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20.\x5c[original-file-name]\x20(success)\x3cbr\x3e\x3cb\x3e\x20vs.\x20\x3c/b\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20..\x5c[original-file-name]\x20(failure)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eSample\x20Exploit\x20Structures:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20Web:\x20[traversal]\x5c[target-file]\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x20bgcolor=\x27#1AC6FF\x27\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cU\x3e\x3cB\x3eExamples\x20of\x20Exploits:\x3c/B\x3e\x3c/U\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cTR\x3e\x3cTD\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x201:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22include.jsp\x22\x20%\x3e\x20\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x202:\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22..\x5c\x5c..\x5c\x5cWEB-INF\x5c\x5cweb.xml\x22\x20%\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3eIndependent\x20Exploit\x203\x20(Simple\x20Evasion):\x3c/B\x3e\x20\x3c%=\x22....//....//WEB-INF/web.xml\x22\x20%\x3e\x20(After\x20removal\x20of\x20\x22../\x22:\x20\x22....//\x22\x20turns\x20to\x20\x22../\x22)\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TD\x3e\x3c/TR\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3c/TABLE\x3e\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x3cB\x3e\x3ca\x20href=\x22Case56-LFI-FileClass-FilenameContext-WindowsTraversalRemoval-OSPath-DefaultFullInput-NoPathReq-Read.jsp\x22\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20\x20Case56-LFI-FileClass-FilenameContext-WindowsTraversalRemoval-OSPath-DefaultFullInput-NoPathReq-Read.jsp\x3c/a\x3e\x3c/B\x3e\x3cbr\x3e\x0d\x0a\x20\x20LFI\x20attack\x20abusing\x20the\x20File\x20class:\x20injection\x20into\x20a\x20filename\x20context,\x20using\x20an\x20OS\x20path\x20with\x20windows\x20traversal\x20removal,\x20default\x20full\x20path\x20input,\
